PERSONA:
john is a 55-year-old married white man who was born in another country but has lived in the united states for over 21 years. he is a citizen and a registered voter. john has a high school education or less and identifies as jewish, although he never attends religious services. 

despite his moderate political ideology, john leans towards the republican party. he comes from an upper-income family, earning $100,000 or more annually. john resides in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states.

while he doesn't engage in volunteerism, john is an avid internet user, spending almost constant time online. he maintains an independent party affiliation but tends to support republican candidates and policies. john leads a comfortable life with his wife and enjoys the amenities of living in a major metropolitan area in the southern part of the country.
